article.name: Lucy Smile - Elfen Lied
article.description:
This is my first concerted effort at an anime style drawing brought to life in vivid technicolour.
The girl is based off the Character Lucy/Nyuu from the anime show [i]Elfen Lied[/i].
I originally sketched the picture out on A4 paper based off a still. I then scanned it in digitally and traced over it using Flash vectors. This allowed me to use layers to easily manage the different blocks of colour and perfect the seams between areas.
I\'m very pleased with it. With the vector, I can print it out at almost any size. At the moment its an A4 colour print out on my wall.
article.keywords: Lucy Smile Nyuu Elfen Lied Flash vector drawing anime fan listings lucy fan
